oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Processing map for hot working of powder metallurgy 2124 Al-20 Vol% SiCp metal matrix composite
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MURTY, SVSN
RAO, BN
KASHYAP, BP
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A simple instability condition based on the Ziegler's instability criterion is found to be more appropriate in delineating the regimes of flow instabilities in the processing maps of 2124 Al-20 Vol% SiCp metal matrix composite. Applicability of the criterion is demonstrated using the reported microstructural observations in open literature.
